scripts.test:chrome:headed: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project chrome --headed
scripts.test:chrome:headless: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project chrome
scripts.test:firefox:headed: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project firefox --headed
scripts.test:firefox:headless: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project firefox
scripts.test:webkit:headed: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project webkit --headed
scripts.test:webkit:headless: npm run pretest && npx playwright test --project webkit
